name: Neohell
description:
NeoHell is hectic PvP bullet hell prototype where two players have to fight eachother whilst increasing in strength the further the fight develops.  The game can be played with 2 people and requires a controller.

Controls:

Left Stick: Move

Right Stick: Aim/Fire projectile

A Button [Hold to charge]: Dash (attack)

X Button: Melee Attack

Y Button: Parry

B Button [When ready]: Ultimate Move

Left Trigger [Hold]: Char
